name: Discussing Death
description:
Discussing Death

Discussing Death is a game aimed towards children between the ages of 5 to 11. The goal of the project was to help children understand the concept of death and dying without using indirect language.

The player will encounter emotions that are commonly felt when dealing with the loss of a loved one.

Created in Unreal Engine 4 for Windows Operating Systems.

Story

The leader of your peaceful island has died and the island has split apart!

It is now up to you to help the people process the idea of death and bring the island back together.
